body:
This is a 3DS exculsive that just came out. It sounds girlish, but it is awesome.
My first 30 minutes of it of it were a person obsessing over books, 2 people fighting and throwing things at each other, and rap battles.
Badass.

replies.body: I have Tomodachi Life. One word: Amazing! The game is brilliant and features many different options to choose from! You can make concerts, have a pet, get some hats, and more! I just love this game.
